constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 128 (Wednesday, July 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. BOURDEAUX:
H.R. 4595.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to Clause 1 of Section 8 of
Article 1 of the Constitution of the United States, which
reads as follows: The Congress shall have Power To lay and
collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises, to pay the Debts
and provide for the common Defense and general Welfare of the
United States; but all Duties, Imposts and Excises shall be
uniform throughout the United States.
[Page H3803]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Medicaid Saves Lives Act
